text: Neil Raymond Conn (born 17 August 1936) is an Australian economist and politician. He served as Administrator of the Northern Territory (1997-2000). Conn was appointed by Queen Elizabeth II as Lord Prior of the Order of Saint John in 2014."Lord Prior of St John" , Order of St John website. He was succeeded by Sir Malcolm Ross in 2016. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Australian economists Category:Administrators of the Northern Territory Category:Politicians from New South Wales
title: Neil Conn
